content: Of course, you're free to explore as much (or as little) of these sub-regions of the valley as you'd like, but with the amount of questlines and yaoguai chiefs to find in each spot, we'll be covering each of them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Forest of Felicity'.
The content is as follows:
Of course, you're free to explore as much (or as little) of these sub-regions of the valley as you'd like, but with the amount of questlines and yaoguai chiefs to find in each spot, we'll be covering each of them.
